alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 8:50AM MDT until April 03 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Grand Valley and Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley
